Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 13 Parittattika » 13.5 Saṃsaṭṭhavāra » 13.5.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 13.5.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Naadhipati
Parittattika
Saṃsaṭṭhavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Naadhipati
46.
2003Parittaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho paritto dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—  parittaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (1)
2004Mahaggataṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho mahaggato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—  mahaggate khandhe saṃsaṭṭhā mahaggatā adhipati, vipākaṃ mahaggataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (1)
2005Appamāṇaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho appamāṇo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—  appamāṇe khandhe saṃsaṭṭhā appamāṇā adhipati. (1)
<< Nahetuup Napurejāta >>
